name: Im the village idiot and my goth girl roomate is trying to kill me?!?!?!
name_original: Im the village idiot and my goth girl roomate is trying to kill me?!?!?!
description:
this is an unfinished rpgmaker game. its my first game and its just sort of a practice thing. i wanted to share it to my friends so they can play it themselves.

also dear rpgmaker and apple: screw you both. I want my money back. now no rpgmaker games that aren't by your brand new hundred dollar software will run on a newer Mac. so thanks a freakin lot.
